title: Microsoft has big changes in the works for Windows 11 – and one just arrived
description: File Explorer is getting an extensive overhaul, with a built-in photo gallery being an important part of that project.

title: MacBook Air 15-inch reportedly spotted in testing – but without M3 chip
description: It looks increasingly likely that Apple is poised to unleash the 15-inch Air at WWDC, but it may miss out on a M3 chip upgrade.

title: Quordle today - hints and answers for Saturday, April 15 (game #446)
description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.
